name: Ball War TD - Remastered
description:
The evil balls are attacking the machines once again, now with better graphics, new content, and less bugs! Place machines on the map to try and stop the balls from getting to the exit! Choose from tons of machines, like Cannons, money makers, spikes, and more! Choose from 5 cool maps, grass, desert, snow, city, or ocean. Beating all the balls in a stage will make you unlock a new machine to use... and maybe even a new mode!

Some new things added include:
-New Mini Cannon
-New Cannons as rewards for completing each stage
-Stage Hazards
-Remastered (most) graphics
-2 New title screen backgrounds
-New title remix

This game should update sometimes so keep an eye out!

Please Note: This game is heavily inspired by the Bloons Tower Defense series, and uses music from the it too and from Scratch.mit.edu, so I don't own it

Title remix by Jason Kott
